mn101:7.2: vedhanahetu → vedanāhetu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | tibbā → tippā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn101:11.7: Evaṃvādī → evaṃvādīsu (mr) | kañci → kiñci (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn101:12.1: Puna caparāhaṃ → puna ca parāhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed); puna ca panāhaṃ (mr)
mn101:14.1: tasmiṃ samaye opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vediyetha → tiṭṭheyyeva tasmiṃ samaye … vedanā (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn101:23.5: yassa hi khvāssa → yassa kho hi panassa (si); yassa hi khvassa (sya-all); yassa khvāssa (pts-vp-pli1ed)
